short.ar: تسجيل دخول واحد بأمان لجميع تطبيقاتك بنقرة واحدة
short.am,bg,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,e: Securely Single Sign-On to all of your Apps with one click
short.bn: এক ক্লিকে আপনার সমস্ত অ্যাপে নিরাপদে একক সাইন-অন করুন
short.de: Sicheres Single Sign-On für alle Ihre Apps mit einem Klick
short.es: Inicio de sesión único seguro en todas sus aplicaciones con un solo clic
short.fil: Ligtas na Single Sign-On sa lahat ng iyong Apps sa isang click
short.fr: Authentification unique sécurisée à toutes vos applications en un seul clic
short.hi: एक क्लिक के साथ अपने सभी ऐप्स के लिए सुरक्षित रूप से सिंगल साइन-ऑन
short.id: Sistem Masuk Tunggal dengan aman ke semua Aplikasi Anda dengan satu klik
short.it: Single Sign-On sicuro a tutte le tue app con un clic
short.ja: ワンクリックですべてのアプリに安全にシングルサインオン
short.ko: 한 번의 클릭으로 모든 앱에 안전하게 싱글 사인온
short.nl: Veilig Single Sign-On bij al uw apps met één klik
short.pl: Bezpieczne jednokrotne logowanie do wszystkich aplikacji za pomocą jednego kliknięcia
short.tr: Tüm Uygulamalarınızda Tek Tıkla Güvenli Tek Oturum Açma

long.ar,bn,de,es,fil,fr,hi,id,it,ja,ko,pl,tr:
The Problem

With too many accounts and log-ins, users mostly tend to choose weak, easy to guess passwords, and rarely change passwords, hence placing themselves at risk from fraud and identity theft. Most consumers may have dozens of password-protected accounts. Users with multiple accounts needing passwords often give up and use the same password, or a derivative of the same password for every account which makes them easy targets for hackers. When consumers are required to follow existing security policies and use various log-ins or passwords, they usually end up writing down their passwords making them easy targets.

LogmeOnce Solution

LogmeOnce dashboard offers simple user friendly access for each user to their unique web site which entails a list of all of their applications, with security protection behind each Application icon. Simply click the icon of your desired Application, and you are logged in without the need to enter a username and password each time. Your security credentials for each Application are individually secured and encrypted with your unique encryption key, that only you are aware of.
